components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Malaysia is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 December 2022 at 08:00 PST until 27 December 2022 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Malaysia handsets via subset of Shortcodes.

Our MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance from 28 December 2022 at 20:00 PDT until 29 December 2022 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US handsets via US Toll-free numbers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the US and Canada will be conducting planned maintenance from 28 December 2022 at 20:00 PDT until 29 December 2022 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from both US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Vietnam is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 December 2022 at 08:30 PST until 30 December 2022 at 09:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Vietnam handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France SMS Carrier Maintenance - Bouygues Telecom

incident_updates.body: The Bouygues Telecom network in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 January 2023 at 21:00 PST until 02 January 2023 at 21:45 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Bouygues Telecom handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our SMS Carrier in Germany is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 January 2023 at 13:00 PST until 19 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of Germany Short Codes.

Our SMS Carrier in Germany is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 January 2023 at 13:00 PST until 19 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of Germany Short Codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France SMS Carrier Maintenance - Bouygues Telecom

incident_updates.body: The Bouygues Telecom network in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 January 2023 at 14:00 PST until 23 January 2023 at 21:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Bouygues Telecom handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: UK SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance – O2 Telefonica

incident_updates.body: The O2 Telefonica network in the UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 January 2023 at 15:00 PST until 09 January 2023 at 22:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from O2 Telefonica Phone numbers, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of Twilio UK Long codes.
